data.message: How to Get a reference check of the page to My Official ??

replies.message: Hi Laith. We’re currently only accepting verification requests from Pages that represent celebrities, public figures, sports teams, media and entertainment. Please keep in mind that most Pages and profiles, including local businesses, aren't eligible for verification at this time. You can learn more at: https://www.facebook.com/help/100168986860974. -Sarah
Well thank you for the answer ..... you'd better be me this signal until I get more Likes :) Thanks
